p: The Riyadh region was the highest reporting region for the confirmed cases with 3818 (22.3 %) followed by Jeddah with 3378 (19.8%) cases during the period 2010-2016. The highest number of confirmed cases was reported during 2015 with total cases of 9262 (54.2%). Jeddah reported 2607 (28.1%) during this year, while Riyadh region reported 1976 (21.3%) during the same year. The least reporting regions were Hafr Albatin (only 35 cases, 0.20%) and Jouf (38 cases, 0.21%) during the period 2010-2016.
